医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国生命科学的未来始于西米德兰兹郡在本次采访中，PHTA 首席执行官吉诺·马蒂尼 (Gino Martini) 向 NewsMed 介绍了西米德兰兹郡，该地区在制造业和生命科学方面拥有丰富的传统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-future-of-UK-life-sciences-starts-in-the-West-Midlands.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/The-future-of-UK-life-sciences-starts-in-the-West-Midlands.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41565fc4-c83b-41e8-876b-3176ee584d09 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 08:01:00 -0400 The future of UK life sciences starts in the West Midlands
PacBio Onso™ 短读长测序仪加入 10X Genomics 兼容合作伙伴计划PacBio (PACB) 是高质量、高精度基因组测序解决方案的领先开发商，今天宣布将 Onso 短读长测序平台纳入 10x Genomics 兼容合作伙伴计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Pacbio-Onsoe284a2-short-read-sequencing-instrument-joins-10X-Genomics-known-partner-program-Pacbio.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Pacbio-Onsoe284a2-short-read-sequencing-instrument-joins-10X-Genomics-known-partner-program-Pacbio.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fff83b61-ef9a-401a-a0b1-150228f13aa3 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 07:01:00 -0400 PacBio Onso™ short read sequencing instrument joins 10X Genomics compatible partner program
您可以依靠乳房X光检查来识别心脏病风险吗？如今，当人们检查每年一次的乳房X光检查时，有些人可能会面临一个令人惊讶的问题：除了检查乳房X光检查是否有乳腺癌之外，患者还希望放射科医生检查图像以了解患心脏病的风险吗？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Can-you-rely-on-your-mammogram-to-identify-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Can-you-rely-on-your-mammogram-to-identify-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cce576ac-98cb-4b61-9bc3-a192a0d98361 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 06:37:13 -0400 Can you rely on your mammogram to identify heart disease risk?
马里兰州民众将就广泛的“生殖自由权”进行投票10个州的选民将在11月考虑是否保护或扩大堕胎权。其中包括亚利桑那州和内华达州等战场州以及南达科他州和密苏里州等共和党据点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Marylanders-to-vote-on-expansive-e28098right-to-reproductive-freedome28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Marylanders-to-vote-on-expansive-e28098right-to-reproductive-freedome28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff1d3051-3558-4f6d-af0b-e691fdc12404 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 06:32:25 -0400 Marylanders to vote on expansive ‘right to reproductive freedom’
Calluna Pharma 成功完成 CAL101 的 1 期临床研究，CAL101 是治疗纤维化和纤维炎症适应症的一流疗法Calluna Pharma AS (Calluna) 是一家临床阶段生物技术公司，致力于开发治​​疗炎症和纤维化疾病的一流抗体，今天宣布完成 Calluna 的主要候选产品 CAL101 的 1 期临床研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Calluna-Pharma-successively-completes-Phase-1-clinical-study-of-CAL101-a-first-in-class-therapeutic-for-fibrotic-和-纤维-炎症-适应症.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Calluna-Pharma-successively-completes-Phase-1-clinical-study-of-CAL101-a-first-in-class-therapeutic-for-fibrotic-和-纤维炎症-适应症.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5558b4c3-8caa-494f-9778-f1236bcf3d14 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 05:02:00 -0400 Calluna Pharma successfully completes Phase 1 clinical study of CAL101, a first-in-class therapeutic for fibrotic and fibro-inflammatory indications
研究将大脑体积变化与帕金森病和多动症的遗传风险因素联系起来前所未有的基因组分析揭示了大脑结构与帕金森症和多动症等疾病之间的遗传联系，为创新治疗铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Study-connects-brain-volume-variations-with-genic-risk-factors-for-Parkinsone28099s-disease-and-ADHD.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Study-connects-brain-volume-variations-with-genic-risk-factors-for-Parkinsone28099s-disease-and-ADHD.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5b48bc9-0428-46d5-9f82-115ea197729f Wed, 23 Oct 2024 05:01:00 -0400 Study connects brain volume variations with genetic risk factors for Parkinson’s disease and ADHD
人类中脑类器官：对抗帕金森病的有前途的工具类器官技术的进步对于帕金森病研究至关重要，为研究疾病和测试疗法提供了与人类相关的模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Human-midbrain-organoids-A-promising-tool-in-the-fight-against-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Human-midbrain-organoids-A-promising-tool-in-the-fight-against-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5cd931c8-485c-4386-b0a0-47ea9810066d Wed, 23 Oct 2024 04:30:00 -0400 Human midbrain organoids: A promising tool in the fight against Parkinson's disease
P-茎核糖体被确定为癌症免疫逃避的关键调节因子研究揭示了 P 茎核糖体如何调节细胞因子反应，从而驱动多种癌症类型的肿瘤的免疫逃避。它为影响免疫治疗成功的翻译后机制提供了新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/P-stalk-ribosomes-identified-as-key-regulators-of-immune-evasion-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/P-stalk-ribosomes-identified-as-key-regulators-of-immune-evasion-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abdcccac-c19e-408c-a09c-b94192017a85 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 01:03:00 -0400 P-stalk ribosomes identified as key regulators of immune evasion in cancer
水中砷与心脏病风险增加有关根据哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究，即使暴露水平低于联邦监管限值（10微克/升），长期接触水中的砷也可能会增加心血管疾病，尤其是心脏病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Arsenic-in-water-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Arsenic-in-water-linked-to-increased-heart-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d38a060-362b-4d77-8f42-3274089ca946 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 01:01:41 -0400 Arsenic in water linked to increased heart disease risk
母亲的压力和抑郁会改变婴儿的 DNA，并可能产生终生影响怀孕和产后母亲的压力和抑郁与婴儿 DNA 甲基化的变化有关，可能影响他们的发育和长期健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Maternal-stress-and-depression-alter-infant-DNA-with-潜在-lifelong-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241023/Maternal-stress-and-depression-alter-infant-DNA-with-潜在-lifelong-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d532abaa-c804-4e42-838b-dd4dac830541 Wed, 23 Oct 2024 00:42:00 -0400 Maternal stress and depression alter infant DNA, with potential lifelong impact
